requirement of Darker_ 1.1.0 later.Installation============:: $ pip install pytest-darkerUsage=====To run pytest with checks provided by Darker_:: $ pytest --darkerThe plugin will output a diff of suggested formatting changes from Black_ (if any exist).Changes will _not_ be applied automatically.Customizing Black and isort behavior====================================Project-specific default options for Black_ and isort_are read from the project's ``pyproject.toml`` file in the repository root.isort_ also looks for a few other places for configuration.For more details, see:- `Black documentation about pyproject.toml`_- `Black example configuration`_- `isort documentation about config files`_Testing=======To run the tests against a selection of Python interpreters:: $ toxTo run against a specific interpreter (e.g. Python 3.6):: $ tox -e py36The ``tox.ini`` file in the root of this repositoryis used to configure the test environment.License=======Distributed under the terms
